entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:35 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
